response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a significant asset to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
